remarks: Special case of ~ cdlemf showing existence of non-identity translation with trace different from any 3 given lattice elements.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jul-2013.)
statement:
cdlemftr.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemftr.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemftr.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemftr.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemftr3 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> E. f e. T ( f =/= ( _I |` B ) /\ ( ( R ` f ) =/= X /\ ( R ` f ) =/= Y /\ ( R ` f ) =/= Z ) ) ) $.
$d H f $.
$d K f $.
$d R f $.
$d T f $.
$d W f $.
$d X f $.
$d Y f $.
$d Z f $.
